translation.en: Roy!
Roy!
I just want to--
Just all day and all night, you've been riding me.
translation.es: Te la pasas molestándome día y noche.

translation.en: - Don't get upset I-- - Don't get upset when you wake me--
translation.es: - No te enojes… - Me enoja que me despiertes…

translation.en: - I don't like when you-- - I don't care who hears anything.
translation.es: - No me gusta que… - No me importa que me oigan.

translation.en: - Come here! -
I made something for you.
People gather by the thousands to witness the inauguration of John Fitzgerald Kennedy.
translation.es: Miles se reúnen para presenciar la inauguración de John F. Kennedy.

translation.en: they hope to catch a glimpse of First Lady Jackie Kennedy
translation.es: esperan ver a Jackie Kennedy, la primera dama,

translation.en: in a dress by designer Oleg Cassini
translation.es: con un vestido de Oleg Cassini

translation.en: and a simple yet elegant pillbox by hatmaker Mr. Halston.
translation.es: y un simple pero elegante sombrero pillbox del sombrerero Halston.

translation.en: Did they just say your name?
Excuse me. Morning. Good morning.
Elegance, if you will.
I think madam will be really pleased.
translation.es: Creo que la señora estará muy contenta.

translation.en: What the hell is going on?
What's going on?
Ah, so Jacqueline Kennedy dropped your name for one.
translation.es: Pasa que Jacqueline Kennedy mencionó tu nombre.

translation.en: We've sold 50 already, and it's not even 10:00 a.m.
translation.es: Ya vendimos 50, y ni siquiera son las 10:00 a. m.

translation.en: You're him, aren't you?
You're Mr. Halston.
God bless Jackie Kennedy.
Fuck Jackie Kennedy.
Halston! Why would you say that after all she's been through?
translation.es: Halston. ¿Cómo dices eso después de todo lo que sufrió?

translation.en: She made you, Halston.
And then she killed me.
Stopped wearing hats so she wouldn't ruin that awful gigantic hairdo of hers.
translation.es: Dejó de usar sombreros para no arruinar su horrible peinado.

translation.en: Do you have a moment?
I'm sorry. As you can see, we're terribly busy.
translation.es: Lo siento. Como verás, estamos muy ocupados.

translation.en: Halston, the second- quarter report came in. - It's not good. - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: Halston, llegó el informe del segundo trimestre. No es bueno.

translation.en: Hat sales are down 30% from last quarter, and the previous quarter down 40%.
translation.es: Las ventas cayeron un 30 %, y el trimestre anterior, un 40 %.

translation.en: - We're trending up, is what you're saying. - No, that is not what I'm saying.
translation.es: - Dices que estamos subiendo. - No, no digo eso.

translation.en: You know what they say. Numbers.
Who says that?
Oh, everybody. All the time.
People just don't wear hats anymore is the problem.
translation.es: El problema es que la gente ya no usa sombreros.

translation.en: Yes. As a milliner, Henry, I'm well aware of that fact.
translation.es: Sí. Como sombrerero, Henry, soy consciente de eso.

translation.en: Well, what I mean is, what are you going to do about it?
Well, I'm hard at work making the sun brighter,
translation.es: Estoy trabajando para que el sol brille,

translation.en: but until I get my rainmaking machine working,
translation.es: pero hasta que no funcione mi máquina de lluvia,

translation.en: I don't know what I'll do, Henry.
Except maybe drink after this meeting.
translation.es: Excepto beber luego de esta reunión.

translation.en: From the gentleman at the end.
He sent it back.
What is it about an amaretto stone sour that you don't like?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que no te gusta del trago?

translation.en: It's the stone, isn't it? Choking hazard. I'll have the barman remove it.
translation.es: La semilla, ¿no? Peligro de asfixia. Pediré que la quiten.

translation.en: No, thank you.
- Then let me buy you something else. - No, thanks.
I don't accept drinks from strangers.
Then tell me your name. We won't be strangers.
translation.es: Entonces dime tu nombre. No seremos extraños.

translation.en: You go first.
- Eric. - And what do you do, Eric?
translation.es: - Eric. - ¿Y a qué te dedicas, Eric?

translation.en: I'm a falconer.
Bullshit.
We're heroes, really, my falcon and I. Keeping the rat population under control.
translation.es: Mi halcón y yo somos héroes. Controlamos la población de ratas.

translation.en: It's very fashionable, what we do.
translation.es: Está muy de moda lo que hacemos.

translation.en: That long leather glove, that little cap I put over his head.
translation.es: Ese guante de cuero, esa gorra que le pongo.

translation.en: It's kinky.
Let me buy you a drink.
Can I ask what is it about me that caught your eye?
translation.es: ¿Puedo preguntarte qué te llamó la atención de mí?

translation.en: How do you mean?
I mean, why are you trying to pick me up and not anybody else?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me quieres levantar a mí y no a otro?

translation.en: I'm not like anybody else.
Just wouldn't have thought I was your type.
translation.es: No creí que fuera tu tipo.

translation.en: And what's my type?
A white guy in a Brooks Brothers suit.
translation.es: Un blanco con traje de Brooks Brothers.

translation.en: Or… maybe you're just a size queen.
translation.es: O tal vez solo te gustan grandes.

translation.en: Or…
maybe I've been an outsider, too, my whole life.
translation.es: tal vez yo también he sido un marginado toda mi vida,

translation.en: Getting sideways glances from white guys in Brooks Brothers suits
translation.es: a quien los blancos con trajes de Brooks Brothers miraban de reojo

translation.en: for what I was and who I liked or who I was and what I liked.
translation.es: por lo que era y quién me gustaba o por quién era y lo que me gustaba.

translation.en: Till one day, I just stopped giving a flying fuck.
translation.es: Hasta que un día dejó de importarme.

translation.en: Ed.
Ed is my name.
Nice meeting you, Eric.
Though Eric's not your real name, is it?
translation.es: Pero Eric no es tu verdadero nombre, ¿no?

translation.en: Roy.
Though that's not my real name either.
translation.es: Ese tampoco es mi verdadero nombre.

translation.en: I like people to call me Halston.
translation.es: Me gusta que me llamen Halston.

translation.en: Get the fuck out. The hat designer?
translation.es: No me jodas. ¿El diseñador de sombreros?

translation.en: I've always wondered this. How does somebody end up designing hats?
translation.es: Siempre me he preguntado eso. ¿Cómo alguien diseña sombreros?

translation.en: It's sculpture, really.
I've always done it. I made hats to lift my mother's spirits.
translation.es: Siempre he diseñado. Hacía sombreros para levantarle el ánimo a mi madre.

translation.en: Oh, honey.
You are far too special for this place.
translation.es: Eres demasiado especial para este lugar.

translation.en: I had a magical childhood.
But I left Indiana as soon as I could. First to Chicago and then here.
translation.es: Pero me fui de Indiana en cuanto pude. Primero a Chicago y luego aquí.

translation.en: Made myself out of nothing.
Whole cloth, as it were.
Men like us…
come here from some faraway place to invent ourselves.
translation.es: vienen de un lugar lejano para inventarse.

translation.en: Make something out of nothing.
I didn't come from as far.
translation.es: Yo no vine de tan lejos.

translation.en: Just crossed the river from New Jersey, but…
translation.es: Solo crucé el río desde Nueva Jersey,

translation.en: That version of me seems very far away.
translation.es: pero esa versión de mí parece muy lejana.

translation.en: So, what are you going to do now?
Women don't wear hats anymore. Well, Ed, I have a plan.
translation.es: - Las mujeres ya no usan sombreros. - Bueno, Ed, tengo un plan.

translation.en: Have you ever heard of Ralph Lifshitz?
Who?
Recently, Ralph Lifshitz walks into Bloomingdale's
translation.es: Hace poco, Ralph Lifshitz fue a Bloomingdale's

translation.en: with a line of ties one inch wider than any other tie being sold
translation.es: con una línea de corbatas 2.5 centímetros más anchas que las demás

translation.en: and a label that says Polo.
translation.es: y una etiqueta que decía Polo.

translation.en: They said, If you make them one inch narrower
translation.es: Dijeron: Si las haces 2.5 centímetros más angostas

translation.en: and you swap your label for ours, we'll sell them.
translation.es: y cambias tu etiqueta por la nuestra, las venderemos.

translation.en: He said no.
And he walked out of there. And then two weeks later,
translation.es: Y salió de ahí. Y dos semanas después, Bloomingdale's se retracta.

translation.en: Bloomingdale's, they come back to the table.
translation.es: Y dos semanas después, Bloomingdale's se retracta.

translation.en: They say, We made a mistake.
We love your ties. We're haunted by them.
You can keep your label. You can keep them one inch wider.
translation.es: Puedes mantener tu etiqueta y el ancho.

translation.en: And we want you to make shirts to go with them.
translation.es: Y también queremos que hagas camisas.

translation.en: I've been designing hats for Bergdorf's since 1961.
I put that fucking place on the map.
translation.es: Puse ese maldito lugar en el mapa.

translation.en: I'm gonna do what Ralph Lifshitz did, only bigger.
translation.es: Haré lo que hizo Ralph Lifshitz, pero más grande.

translation.en: Why don't I know this name?
Because he changed his last name to fucking Lauren.
translation.es: Porque cambió su apellido a Lauren.

translation.en: I have a vision, Ed.
So, a store within a store?
See? Simple.
But to sell what?
Halston.
I wanna be the first person who's also a complete line.
translation.es: Quiero ser la primera persona que tenga una línea completa.

translation.en: Women will come to me,
and I will provide them a complete, custom couture experience.
translation.es: y les daré una experiencia completa de alta costura.

translation.en: I'll put her in Halston, head to toe. Dress, bra, panties, hose, shoes--
translation.es: Las vestiré de Halston de pies a cabeza. Vestido, sostén, bragas, medias, zapatos…

translation.en: I don't know, Halston.
No one wants European knockoffs anymore.
translation.es: Ya nadie quiere imitaciones de Europa.

translation.en: What if Bergdorf Goodman could house the first American couturier?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si Bergdorf Goodman tuviera al primer diseñador estadounidense?

translation.en: - You? - No.
Halston.
Which is me.
It's interesting.
Why don't you start by making us some dresses?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no empezamos con unos vestidos?

translation.en: Okay, so then what happened? How many did you sell?
Well, you won't believe it.
It was an unmitigated disaster. No sales. Total flop.
translation.es: Fue un desastre absoluto. No hubo ventas. Fracaso total.

translation.en: Oh my God. I'm so sorry. Are you okay?
I'm fine. What do you mean? I was brilliant. They're the dummies.
translation.es: Claro que estoy bien. Estuve brillante. Ellos son los tontos.

translation.en: Let me freshen you up.
- But what are you gonna do? - Keep going.
The show didn't work. That's fine. I know what I have to do.
translation.es: El desfile no funcionó. Está bien. Sé qué debo hacer.

translation.en: And what is that?
I'm too big for that room.
I need to get out on my own.
You are fucking impressive, man.
I mean, here's the thing though. I know you love yes people.
translation.es: Esta es la cuestión. Sé que amas a la gente que siempre dice que sí.

translation.en: And I got a lot more syllables up my sleeve than just yes.
translation.es: Y tengo muchas más sílabas en la manga que sí.

translation.en: Try me. Tell me something you think I won't like.
translation.es: Inténtalo. Dime algo que creas que no me gustará.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
That collection you did for Bergdorf's? Looked like cement.
translation.es: Tu colección para Bergdorf parecía de cemento.

translation.en: That's why they didn't sell. Nobody wanted 'em.
translation.es: Por eso no se vendieron. Nadie los quiso.

translation.en: Nobody understood them.
You don't want to understand a dress. You want to love it.
translation.es: No quieres entender un vestido. Quieres amarlo.

translation.en: You want to be Balenciaga. There's already a Balenciaga.
translation.es: Quieres ser Balenciaga Ya hay un Balenciaga.

translation.en: What we need is to figure out your signature.
translation.es: Lo que necesitamos es averiguar tu identidad.

translation.en: What's gonna make me see some gorgeous woman
translation.es: ¿Qué me hará ver a una mujer hermosa

translation.en: out in a supper club wearing a fabulous ensemble
translation.es: en un club con un conjunto fabuloso

translation.en: and say, That's a Halston.
translation.es: y decir: Eso es un Halston?

translation.en: So, does that mean you're in?
Good evening.
I have to tell you I have a problem sometimes.
translation.es: Debo decirles que a veces tengo un problema.

translation.en: And that's my name.
For instance, someone might come up to me and say, Hello, Lisa. How are you?
translation.es: Por ejemplo, alguien se acerca y me dice: Hola, Lisa. ¿Cómo estás?.

translation.en: And I'll say, I'm fine, thank you, but it's Liza. It has a 'Z' in it.
translation.es: Contesto: Gracias, pero es Liza. Tiene una Z.

translation.en: Or someone might say, Lisa, what a nice hat you have on.
translation.es: O alguien me dice: Lisa, qué lindo sombrero tienes.

translation.en: And I'll say, Thank you very much, but my name is Liza.
translation.es: Muchas gracias, pero mi nombre es Liza.

translation.en: - Liza! - And that's my hair.
- Brava! - Wonderful!
- Liza! - Hm?
Meet Halston.
Yeah, I saw you out there.
Everyone else is going berserk,
translation.es: Todos los demás estaban como locos,

translation.en: and you are sitting there like you're in a Dutch Masters painting.
translation.es: y ustedes estaban ahí sentados como pintados al óleo.

translation.en: If I'm honest, I was a little distracted by the Buster Brown getup.
translation.es: Para ser honesto, me distrajo un poco el atuendo pueril.

translation.en: I think you need a new look.
translation.es: Creo que necesitas un nuevo look.

translation.en: - I love him already.  - I knew you would.
translation.es: - Ya lo amo. - Sabía que lo amarías.

translation.en: Exactly. The collection was a disaster, and I knew it.
translation.es: Exacto. La colección fue un desastre, y lo sabía.

translation.en: So I decided to throw it all away.
translation.es: Así que tiré todo por la borda.

translation.en: I left Bergdorf's and destroyed my life, basically.
translation.es: Me fui de Bergdorf y básicamente destruí mi vida.

translation.en: No. No, you can't think of it like that.
You didn't throw anything away. You just gave yourself an enormous gift.
translation.es: No tiraste nada por la borda. Te diste un gran regalo.

translation.en: You left everything you knew behind, which means
translation.es: Dejaste atrás lo conocido, lo que significa que estás abierto a la inspiración.

translation.en: you are open to inspiration.
translation.es: lo que significa que estás abierto a la inspiración.

translation.en: And inspiration is going to find you.
You know what?
That pillbox hat that Jackie wore? That is your Judy Garland.
translation.es: Ese sombrero pillbox que usó Jackie es tu Judy Garland.

translation.en: You and me are living under the shadow of something,
translation.es: Tú y yo vivimos bajo la sombra de algo,

translation.en: and we're both trying to do the same thing.
translation.es: y ambos intentamos hacer lo mismo.

translation.en: We're walking away. Saying, No. I wanna be taken seriously on my own.
translation.es: Nos marchamos. Decimos: No. Quiero que me tomen en serio por mi cuenta.

translation.en: I'm--
I… I don't wanna be just Judy Garland's daughter.
translation.es: ser solo la hija de Judy Garland.

translation.en: Like you don't wanna just be Jackie O's hatmaker.
translation.es: Como tú no quieres ser el sombrerero de Jackie O.

translation.en: Why are you dressing like a little girl?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te vistes como una niña?

translation.en: Okay, see? Exactly. Why do I do that?
I mean, it's cute, sure, but it's not you. I don't think.
translation.es: Es lindo, pero no eres tú. No me parece.

translation.en: You're a woman. You should be dressed like one.  Mmm.
translation.es: Eres una mujer. Deberías vestirte como tal.

translation.en: And I suppose you're just the fella to help.
translation.es: Y supongo que tú eres el tipo que ayuda.

translation.en: Yes, I think I am.
♪ Early dawning ♪ ♪ Sunday morning ♪
Let's lose the bra and panties.
translation.es: Quítate el sostén y las bragas.

translation.en: Halston, are you getting fresh with me?
- Hardly. -
Now, hold this. That's your neck there.
translation.es: Ahora, sostén esto. Va a ser el cuello.

translation.en: Now…
- Ready? - Mm- hmm.
There, now.
That's a Halston.
Oh my God!
Oh! Halston, you're a genius.
Oh my.
Beautiful.
This place will be your blank canvas. Third floor is the sewing room.
translation.es: Este lugar será tu lienzo en blanco. El tercer piso es el cuarto de costura.

translation.en: All state of the art like Balenciaga in Paris.
translation.es: Todo vanguardista, como Balenciaga en París.

translation.en: And this will be the lounge.
And in here will be the salon where it's all really gonna happen.
translation.es: Y aquí estará el salón donde todo sucederá.

translation.en: I wanna create a new kind of experience.
translation.es: Quiero crear un nuevo tipo de experiencia.

translation.en: I want women to come here
translation.es: Quiero que las mujeres vengan aquí

translation.en: and feel like they've been transported to a different world.
translation.es: Quiero que las mujeres vengan aquí y sientan que fueron transportadas a otro mundo.

translation.en: What sort of design are you picturing?
Well, you know, Halston, rich, textural, cool.
translation.es: Bueno, ya sabes, Halston, rico, texturizado, genial.

translation.en: Like Shangri- La on the Upper East Side.
translation.es: Como el Shangri-La en el Upper East Side.

translation.en: Okay. Halston, how long have we known one another?
translation.es: Bien. Halston, ¿cuánto hace que nos conocemos?

translation.en: Uh- oh.
I love you like family.
But what you're describing costs money, and I happen to know you don't got any.
translation.es: Pero lo que describes cuesta dinero, y sé que no lo tienes.

translation.en: - Not true! Not true. - Mmm.
In all of humanity, you're the only one who can do this.
translation.es: De hecho, tú eres el único que puede hacerlo.

translation.en: What you did with the Opera Club at the Met…
translation.es: Lo que hiciste con el Opera Club en el Met…

translation.en: That cost a zillion dollars.
You're the only one who can do it.
translation.es: Eres el único que puede hacerlo.

translation.en: You made fucking Key West fashionable, Angelo.
translation.es: Pusiste de moda a Cayo Hueso, Angelo.

translation.en: Halston, you can't afford me.
Well, can't you do it at cost?
It's like your ears don't work.
Look, I'm giving you the opportunity to have the cream of New York society
translation.es: Mira, te estoy dando la oportunidad de que la élite neoyorquina

translation.en: coming through these doors and looking at this place going,
translation.es: pase por estas puertas, mire este lugar y diga:

translation.en: Oh, it's spectacular. Who designed it?
God as my witness, that's worth more than whatever the Opera Club paid you.
translation.es: Dios como testigo, eso vale más de lo que te pagó el Opera Club.

translation.en: - Do you mean that? - Have I ever lied to you?
translation.es: - ¿Lo dices en serio? - ¿Alguna vez te mentí?

translation.en: - Okay. - Oh, my hero. My hero!
- Knock it off. - So, what do you think?
Someone's in a good mood.
It's always been my dream to have a showroom with a workshop on another floor.
translation.es: Mi sueño era tener una sala de muestras con un taller en otro piso.

translation.en: And I found it, and I rented it.
translation.es: Y lo encontré y lo alquilé.

translation.en: - Where? - 68th and Madison.
Wait till you see it. Literally wait to see it. It's a mess.
translation.es: Espera a verlo, literalmente. Es un desastre.

translation.en: And I found my team. Merry misfits, each and every one of them.
translation.es: Y encontré a mi equipo. Un grupo de perfectos inadaptados.

translation.en: Joe Eula's gonna be my illustrator. He's fantastic.
translation.es: Joe Eula será mi ilustrador. Es fantástico.

translation.en: He drew collections for Vogue, for Givenchy, for Coco Chanel.
translation.es: Trabajó para Vogue, para Givenchy, para Coco Chanel.

translation.en: Chic is hard to capture. It's elusive, but he can do it.
translation.es: La elegancia es difícil de plasmar. Es complicado, pero él puede hacerlo.

translation.en: Why do you need an illustrator? I want to see a whole collection laid out in front of me.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué necesitas un ilustrador? - Quiero ver toda la colección.

translation.en: Get rid of that. Lower that neckline.
translation.es: Deshazte de eso. Baja ese escote.

translation.en: It's a very intimate relationship between a designer and his illustrator.
translation.es: Hay una relación muy íntima entre un diseñador y su ilustrador.

translation.en: Joe's more of like a second brain, but stop breaking my train of thought.
translation.es: Joe es como un segundo cerebro, pero no me interrumpas.

translation.en: - Sorry. - Elsa Peretti.
She's gonna be my fit model. She's Italian. Comes from money, but she's left all that behind.
translation.es: Será mi modelo. Es italiana. De familia adinerada, pero dejó eso atrás.

translation.en: She's stunning. You can't take your eyes off her.
translation.es: Es bellísima. No puedes dejar de mirarla.

translation.en: Some models just wear clothes. Elsa, she makes them her own.
translation.es: Algunas modelos solo visten ropa. Elsa la hace suya.

translation.en: - I thought Liza was your muse? - Well, you can't have too many muses.
translation.es: - Creí que Liza era tu musa. - Nunca sobran las musas.

translation.en: Don't be jealous, Ed.
Then there's this kid, Schumacher.
He does the windows at Paraphernalia. He'll bring me that young attitude.
translation.es: Hace las vidrieras de Paraphernalia. Me traerá esa actitud joven.

translation.en: - Excuse me. Did you do this? - Yes. - Did you do this? - Yes. I…
translation.es: - Disculpa, ¿tú hiciste esto? - Sí. Yo diseñé los vestidos.

translation.en: The team's all in place. Last thing I need to do is find the money.
translation.es: El equipo está listo. Ahora debo conseguir el dinero.

translation.en: Last? I'd have thought that's the first thing you had to do.
I just need a teensy- weensy million dollars.
translation.es: Solo necesito un millón de dólares.

translation.en: A million dollars?
The idea was to go to the rich husbands of my old clients at Bergdorf's and ask them.
translation.es: La idea era pedirles a los esposos ricos de mis exclientes de Bergdorf.

translation.en: Arthur Vanderbilt, Charles Engelhard, Baron de Rothschild.
translation.es: Arthur Vanderbilt, Charles Engelhard, el barón de Rothschild.

translation.en: And how did that work out?
Well, they didn't say no.
Anyway, I'm not worried.
Tomorrow I have a meeting with Estelle Marsh. She's the wife of a Texas oil baron.
translation.es: Mañana me reúno con Estelle Marsh, esposa de un magnate petrolero de Texas.

translation.en: Don't look at me like that. I've got this sewn up.
translation.es: No me mires así. Me la meteré en el bolsillo.

translation.en: Mrs. Marsh, when was the last time anyone asked you, really asked you
translation.es: Señora Marsh, ¿cuándo fue la última vez que alguien le preguntó, de verdad,

translation.en: what you need?
When I was at Bergdorf's, I'd have my ladies sit in my chair,
translation.es: Cuando trabajaba en Bergdorf, mis damas se sentaban,

translation.en: and I'd say, Tell me your troubles. What's bothering you? What do you need?
translation.es: y les decía: Cuéntame tus problemas. ¿Qué te molesta? ¿Qué necesitas?.

translation.en: Such a small question which would almost without fail be met with, well,
translation.es: Una pregunta tan pequeña que casi siempre suscitaba, bueno,

translation.en: at first, a little sorrow.
Because so few people in their lives, especially the men,
translation.es: Porque pocas personas, en especial sus maridos,

translation.en: ever thought to ask them that.
The way my ex- husband used to put it was, What the fuck do you want?
translation.es: Como mi exesposo solía decir: ¿Qué carajo quieres?.

translation.en: Mrs. Marsh.
Did you ever visit Balenciaga in Paris for Made to Order?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez fue a un Balenciaga de París donde se pide a medida?

translation.en: Come.
Balenciaga loves making women feel afraid.
translation.es: A Balenciaga le encanta intimidar a las mujeres.

translation.en: When you climb the stairs to his atelier,
translation.es: Si sube las escaleras a su taller,

translation.en: you're met by a very stern secretary who makes you feel unimportant, even ugly.
translation.es: la recibe una secretaria muy seria que la hace sentir insignificante, incluso fea.

translation.en: That won't happen here.
This will be the lounge, where you'll take a breath,
translation.es: Esta será la sala, donde se dará un respiro,

translation.en: let go, tell us what you need,
translation.es: se relajará, nos dirá qué necesita,

translation.en: be reminded of what you're capable of.
translation.es: recordará de lo que es capaz.

translation.en: There'll be tea, champagne…
Some of our younger staff may even be able to get you marijuana.
translation.es: Nuestros empleados más jóvenes podrían conseguirle marihuana.

translation.en: Come.
Here.
This will be the salon.
I'll have my girls model the latest collection.
translation.es: Haré que mis chicas modelen la última colección.

translation.en: Then you'll choose from those designs,
and then I'll build your choices to your measurements.
translation.es: y los confeccionaré según sus medidas.

translation.en: Mrs. Marsh,
because women like Catherine Deneuve, Jackie Kennedy,
translation.es: si mujeres como Catherine Deneuve, Jackie Kennedy, usted

translation.en: you custom order your clothing here, within five years,
translation.es: si mujeres como Catherine Deneuve, Jackie Kennedy, usted compran ropa a medida aquí, en cinco años, Halston Limited estará

translation.en: Halston Limited will be picked up by every reputable department store
translation.es: en cinco años, Halston Limited estará en cada tienda departamental de renombre del país.

translation.en: in the United States.
translation.es: en cada tienda departamental de renombre del país.

translation.en: I'm gonna change the face of American fashion.
translation.es: Cambiaré el rumbo de la moda estadounidense.

translation.en: And it will all be because of you.
translation.es: Y todo será gracias a usted.

translation.en: You could talk a leopard out of its spots.
translation.es: Tu labia podría sacar a un perro de una carnicería.

translation.en: How much, exactly, are you looking for?
A million dollars.
I'll give you 100,000.
Oh, and you're gonna hire my son, Michael.
translation.es: Y vas a contratar a mi hijo, Michael.

translation.en: He's handy.
He can do all sorts of work. He could even model.
translation.es: Puede hacer todo tipo de trabajo. Hasta podría modelar.

translation.en: Deal.
Thank you, Mrs. Marsh. Thank you. Come. Let's have tea.
translation.es: Gracias, señora Marsh. Venga. Vamos a tomar té.

translation.en: This is fucking terrible. Who made this one?
I did.
Don't take this the wrong way,
but that's the worst fucking dress I've ever seen.
translation.es: pero es el peor vestido que he visto.

translation.en: Looks like a prom dress, but for a Martian.
translation.es: Parece un vestido de graduación, pero para una marciana.

translation.en: - Dai, Halston. - Okay, Halston, easy.
Don't easy me, Joe. We have a fucking show in two weeks. These designs are shit.
translation.es: Calma nada. El desfile es en dos semanas. Estos diseños son una mierda.

translation.en: I think if she had a nice, big piece of chunky jewelry--
translation.es: Creo que si tuviera alguna joya grande…

translation.en: We're not selling jewelry, Elsa! We're selling dresses to human women.
translation.es: ¡No vendemos joyas, Elsa! Vendemos vestidos a mujeres humanas.

translation.en: - Take it off. - Maybe in the right color?
You do not get to talk.
Joel, these designs are not working. You must be able to see that.
translation.es: Estos diseños no funcionan. Deberías darte cuenta.

translation.en: - Sorry. - No, don't say sorry. Do better.
translation.es: - Perdón. - No pidas perdón. Hazlo mejor.

translation.en: Halston, please! You're mad at yourself and taking it out on the kid.
translation.es: Halston, por favor. Estás frustrado y te desquitas con él.

translation.en: I cannot do this all on my own, everybody!
I didn't hire you so that I could do all the work myself.
translation.es: No los contraté para hacerlo todo yo.

translation.en: - That's what's happening! - Why don't we take a break?
Because we haven't got time.
There's not one of these designs I would put my name to. Not one.
translation.es: A ninguno de estos diseños le pondría mi nombre. A ninguno.

translation.en: The fucking embarrassment.
Where's the suede trench coat?
Uh… Yeah, just one second.
What happened?
Um… Well, this is stupid. It was raining today.
translation.es: Bueno, una tontería. Hoy estaba lloviendo.

translation.en: Who wore it out in the rain? It's a trench coat, Halston.
translation.es: - ¿Quién lo usó bajo la lluvia? - Es un trench, Halston.

translation.en: I… I did.
Suede is not waterproof, as it turns out, and it just…
translation.es: Resulta que la gamuza no es impermeable. Y como puedes ver, no funcionará.

translation.en: As you can see, it's just not going to work.
translation.es: Y como puedes ver, no funcionará.

translation.en: Well, the cut's fantastic. Look at it.
translation.es: Bueno, el corte es fantástico. Míralo.

translation.en: It's just the wrong material, but it's the right idea.
translation.es: No es la tela correcta, pero es una buena idea.

translation.en: No, suede is not waterproof.
translation.es: No, la gamuza no es impermeable.

translation.en: But it is the right idea.
No one else is doing that. I wanted that. I wanted that…
that sensation.
Everyone knows suede is not waterproof.
translation.es: Todos saben que la gamuza no es impermeable.

translation.en: I know, Halston. I'm sorry.
Schumacher, you're a junior partner, right?
- That's your title. - Yeah.
Do you think you're earning that title as of now?
translation.es: ¿Crees que te estás ganando ese puesto?

translation.en: It's a simple yes or no question.
Are you earning the title of junior partner right now?
translation.es: ¿Te estás ganando el puesto de socio menor en este momento?

translation.en: No.
Oh fuck.
Halston.
Jesus!
Sorry, thought I locked it. Sorry.
translation.es: Lo siento, pensé que la había cerrado.

translation.en: What are you doing?
I was just taking a second to collect my thoughts.
translation.es: Solo vine a pensar un segundo.

translation.en: No. What are you doing?
Is it heroin?
No. No, it's… it's just speed.
How often do you do that?
Not-- I'm-- I don't know, every…
Every day?
No, not always.
You shoot speed every day?
Yeah.
Yes, I do.
With all the work we're doing, it's…
So, you started doing this when you came to work for me?
No. No.
It's just a thing I do.
You know, it keeps me focused. It's… It's how I get into the groove.
translation.es: Me mantiene concentrado. Así es como mantengo mi ritmo.

translation.en: Do I need to do something here? Take you somewhere?
Do I need to be worried?
No.
I… I don't know.
I… I don't belong here, do I?
I think we're… we're all a bit like little ships lost at sea.
translation.es: Creo que todos somos como pequeños barcos perdidos en el mar.

translation.en: We've all been through a lot.
Left our families, been rejected one way or another.
translation.es: Dejamos a nuestras familias, fuimos rechazados de un modo u otro.

translation.en: Bunch of queers and freaks and girls who haven't grown up yet.
translation.es: Somos un montón de maricas y bichos raros y chicas inmaduras.

translation.en: I think you belong here.
You're very talented, Joel, but there's too much at stake here.
translation.es: Eres muy talentoso, Joel, pero hay mucho en juego.

translation.en: I think you can see that.
If you wanna keep working for me, you gotta get clean.
translation.es: Si quieres seguir aquí, debes desintoxicarte.

translation.en: I do. I mean, I will.
It's just--
When you bite my head off about the designs--
translation.es: Cuando me atacas por los diseños…

translation.en: If you stop shooting speed,
I'll stop biting your head off.
Okay.
- Okay? - Okay.
Halston.
There's something I wanna show you.
I didn't show you because I thought you'd get mad, but…
translation.es: No te lo mostré porque pensé que te enojarías.

translation.en: it might be good.
How did you make it?
Uh, just in my kitchen.
- Boiling dyes on the stove. - Oh, I love it.
No one's doing this.
So modern, sensual.
Here, help me find the middle of the length.
translation.es: Ven, ayúdame a doblarla a la mitad.

translation.en: Okay. Lay it down.
Scissors, someone.
Thank you, Joe.
Elsa, come.
Now.
Lose that.
There's something there.
Joel, just pin down this edge
and bring these two edges together in a diagonal going right down.
translation.es: y une estos dos en diagonal hacia abajo.

translation.en: Now, what about the lengths, Joe?
I'm thinking lower.
Maybe bring up the hem.
Yeah, let me see.
Now.
Che bello.
Something's not right.
It's the hair.
Et voilà.
Yes.
Now. Walk.
Thank you.
Oh, they loved it! I think they loved it.
Fuck.
- Well, Halston, these are not bad. - They're not good.
translation.es: - Halston, no dicen nada malo. - Tampoco nada bueno.

translation.en: Yes, this one is.
Senti. Effortless and elegant,
Halston is an exciting new voice in women's fashion.
translation.es: Halston es una voz nueva y emocionante en la moda femenina.

translation.en: Well…
The look they've assembled here is thrown together or contrived.
translation.es: El look que han presentado parece improvisado o forzado.

translation.en: Well, which is it, Bernadine Morris? Thrown together or contrived?
translation.es: ¿En qué quedamos, Bernadine Morris? ¿Improvisado o forzado?

translation.en: This one says, 'You're either young or old,' says Halston.
translation.es: Este dice: Según Halston, o eres joven o eres vieja.

translation.en: Well, that's neither good nor bad. That's just a quote.
translation.es: Eso no es ni bueno ni malo. Es solo una cita.

translation.en: He never ever gets to talk.
A collection isn't a success until there are orders.
translation.es: Una colección es exitosa si hay pedidos.

translation.en: How many orders do we have, Joel?
Not many.
Correct. Zero. Which is, yes, not many.
translation.es: Correcto. Cero. Que no son muchos.

translation.en: Well, on to the next collection.
What? There won't be a next collection.
This was fucking it. We're $200,000 in debt.
translation.es: Se acabó. Tenemos una deuda de $200 000.

translation.en: We haven't paid the rent. In two weeks, they'll turn the lights out.
translation.es: No pagamos la renta. En dos semanas, apagarán las luces.

translation.en: Well, if we're talking about money, you could maybe spend less on orchids.
translation.es: Si hablamos de dinero, podrías gastar menos en orquídeas.

translation.en: That is missing the thrust of what I'm saying, and orchids are part of my process.
translation.es: No me estás siguiendo, y las orquídeas son parte de mi proceso.

translation.en: Can't put a budget on inspiration.
I'll get it.
Pronto, Halston Limited.
Why does he always leave when I raise my voice?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre se va cuando levanto la voz?

translation.en: - Am I that abrasive? - You want me to answer that question?
- Halston. - Who is it? Do they have any money?
Hello?
Oh, hi.
You forgot to flush the toilet.
It's 'cause… um…
Sorry.
Come here.
We had a deal.
I'm under way too much pressure to be having a junkie on my team.
translation.es: Tengo demasiada presión para tolerar un drogadicto en mi equipo.

translation.en: It's so much stress.
I know. How… how can you even handle it?
Because it only takes one person,
translation.es: Solo se necesita a una persona

translation.en: one socialite to change everything.
translation.es: de la alta sociedad para cambiarlo todo.

translation.en: If I can get my designs on the one right person,
translation.es: Si logro que la persona correcta vista mis diseños,

translation.en: I can get them on every woman in America.
translation.es: todas las mujeres del país los usarán.

translation.en: It just takes one yes
from the most sophisticated socialite in New York City,
translation.es: de la persona más sofisticada de Nueva York,

translation.en: and I just got off the phone with her.
translation.es: y acabo de hablar con ella.

translation.en: Babe Paley just called, and she wants to see our collection.
translation.es: Babe Paley me llamó y quiere ver nuestra colección.

translation.en: Babe Paley? Are you serious?
Yes. Now get your fucking shit together.
No, I didn't say that. No, no, no.
No, no. It's… it's just my takeout.
I mean, I love Liza. You know I do.
translation.es: Adoro a Liza. Sabes que sí.

translation.en: But I don't think I can sit through another Liza with a Z.
translation.es: Pero no creo que pueda sentarme a ver otro de sus shows.

translation.en: I know. All right, honey. I'll let you go.
translation.es: Lo sé. Muy bien, cariño. Te dejo.

translation.en: Ciao, ciao.
Can I ask you something?
What's going on here?
What do you mean?
The past few weeks, I haven't seen you smile.
You dress different. You're… You're talking different, for God's sake.
translation.es: Te vistes diferente. Hablas diferente, por el amor de Dios.

translation.en: I could be more to you.
translation.es: Yo podría ser más para ti.

translation.en: Is this not working?
No, it's just that I…
We see each other two, three nights a week?
translation.es: Nos vemos dos o tres noches a la semana.

translation.en: And I still don't feel like I really know you.
translation.es: Y aún siento que no te conozco.

translation.en: That's all. I wanna know you.
I think you know me very well, Ed.
translation.es: Creo que me conoces muy bien, Ed.

translation.en: I think you know me very well, Ed. What is it with the voice?
translation.es: Creo que me conoces muy bien, Ed. ¿Por qué haces esa voz?

translation.en: - What voice? - That one.
You're from Indiana. It's like you're imitating somebody.
translation.es: Eres de Indiana. Es como si imitaras a alguien.

translation.en: I am not.
I take offense to that. I've always been this person.
translation.es: Me ofende. Siempre he sido esta persona.

translation.en: If anyone in this room has changed, it's you.
translation.es: Si alguien aquí ha cambiado eres tú.

translation.en: - Me? - Yes, I make you insecure.
My ambition.
Didn't use to be the case, but it obviously is now.
translation.es: No era el caso, pero ahora sí.

translation.en: Looking for things to pick at. My voice? Good Lord.
translation.es: Quieres criticarme algo. ¿Mi voz? Por favor.

translation.en: Well, all right.
I don't wanna argue.
I don't either.
I think I'll turn in.
Okay.
I'd like to sleep alone.
Beautiful.
Stunning, actually.
But I can't wear them every day.
translation.es: Pero no puedo usarlos todos los días.

translation.en: - You're… you're interested in every day? - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: ¿Le interesa algo para todos los días?

translation.en: Then let me show you something I've been developing.
translation.es: Le mostraré algo que he estado desarrollando.

translation.en: Elsa.
I call it Ultrasuede.
I was working a lot with suede, which I adore.
translation.es: Trabajé mucho con gamuza, la adoro.

translation.en: But wear it in the rain and it's ruined.
translation.es: Pero se arruina bajo la lluvia.

translation.en: So, it occurred to me, I should create my own.
translation.es: Así que se me ocurrió crear mi propia gamuza.

translation.en: This is a new synthetic.
You can throw it in the wash. You can dress it up.
translation.es: Se puede lavar a máquina. Puede ser elegante.

translation.en: You can wear it to lunch. You can take the kids to school in it.
translation.es: Puede usarse para ir a almorzar, llevar a los niños a la escuela.

translation.en: It's sexy. It's comfort.
It's freedom.
I'll take one in every color.
translation.es: Me llevaré uno de cada color.

translation.en: ♪ Everybody is a star ♪
translation.es: BASADA EN EL LIBRO SIMPLY HALSTON, DE STEVEN GAINES

translation.en: ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, ba Ba, ba, ba, ba, ba, ba ♪ ♪ Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh ♪
